title: Tibits - Zurich
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Beer/Wine
description: Cafeteria-style Zurich vegetarian restaurant. Features a self serve buffet that includes hot and cold dishes, and each dish is labeled as vegan, lacto, etc. Pay for food by weight. Fresh fruit juices available. Modern European decor. English spoken. With a bistro just around the corner from the restaurant. Train - Stadelhofen (100m), car parking: Opernhaus car park. Tram 2 and 4 to Opernhaus (25 m) or 11 and 15 to Stadelhofen (50 m).
